/*
	 * carga_RA, carga_RB, carga_RX, s1, s2, sel_ALU (3 bits), carga_N, carga_Z,
	 * carga_C, s5, incrementa_PC, carga_PC, s3, s4, carga_RI, carga_REM, read,
	 * write, carga_RDM
	 */

-> STR - endereçamento direto - no registrador X:
000110000000000101000
000000000000000000100
000000000000100000000
000000000000000101000
000010000000000000001
000000000000000000010

->STR - endereçamento indireto - no registrador A:
000110000000000101000
000000000000000000100
000000000000100000000
000000000000000101000
000000000000000000100
000000000000000101000
000000000000000000001
000000000000000000010

->STR - modo indexado - no registrador A:
000110000000000101000
000000000000000000100
000000000000100000000
000010000000000001000

000000000000000000010

acesso à memoria (read/write)
operações na alu
